title: Subpoenaed Fossil Fuel Documents Reveal an Industry Stuck in the Past
description:
The industry is still running the same five-step plan, to the same end: preserving power, subsidies, and social license.

title: Did Republicans Know About George Santos Before the Election?
description:
The race was neck and neck, but outside Republican groups put almost no cash into Santos’s effort.
